events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday; my vehicle was badly damaged in a collision at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident as it involves damage to the insured vehicle.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your auto accident claim to assist with the process.
Your claim for the car accident has been acknowledged; we appreciate your prompt report.
Please provide the police report and photos of the damaged vehicle to proceed with the claim.
All requested documents including the police report and vehicle photos have been submitted by the claimant.
The investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident and extent of vehicle damage has commenced.
Investigation is complete; damage verified and liability assessment finalized for the vehicle accident.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the investigation findings and policy coverage terms.
The claimant has provided positive feedback on the clear communication and quick settlement proposal.
The auto accident claim has been officially approved, and payment authorization is underway.
Payment for the approved vehicle damage claim has been issued to the policyholderâ€™s bank account.
The auto accident claim file has been closed following successful payment and claimant confirmation.
The case documents and claim details have been archived for future reference as the process is complete.
